titles.title: A bill to accelerate the income tax benefits for charitable cash contributions for the relief of the families of victims of the mass shooting in Virginia Beach, Virginia, on May 31, 2019.
Virginia Beach Strong Act
Virginia Beach Strong Act
Virginia Beach Strong Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Virginia Beach Strong Act
This bill confirms that cash contributions made for the exclusive benefit of the families of the dead or wounded victims of the mass shooting in Virginia Beach, Virginia, on May 31, 2019, shall be treated as tax deductible contributions.
